shortDescription: The wp-hotel-booking plugin through 1.10.2 for WordPress allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code because of an unserialize operation on the thimpress_hotel_booking_1 cookie in load in includes/class-wphb-sessions.php.
vulnerabilityName: thimpress wp_hotel_booking Deserialization of Untrusted Data
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
